name: Penguin Peril
description:
Penguin Peril is a fast paced endless runner game. You can collect snowflakes throughout the levels to customize your penguin. 

Hitting the snowmen will trigger a random event or power up, these range from invincibility to a rock slide. 

The level is split up until different challenges such as the ice bridge or the water jump. You can practice these sections in a more extreme environment via the challenge mode on the main menu. 

---

Some quick notes. A and D to turn, spacebar to jump. Pause button is currently unaccessible. Sorry!
